org.apache.flink.api.java.typeutils.runtime

Class KryoSerializer.AvroSchemaSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Serializer<org.apache.avro.Schema>
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.typeutils.runtime.KryoSerializer.AvroSchemaSerializer
  • Enclosing class:
    KryoSerializer<T>

    public static class KryoSerializer.AvroSchemaSerializer
extends com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Serializer<org.apache.avro.Schema>
    Slow serialization approach for Avro schemas. This is only used with {GenericData.Record} types. Having this serializer, we are able to handle avro Records.
